title: WTB: Ty Cobb bat off t206 low grade good eye appeal
author: bravesfan22

posts.post_title: WTB: Ty Cobb bat off t206 low grade good eye appeal
posts.post_content:
Looking to purchase a Ty Cobb Bat Off T206 graded psa/sgc 1-2.5
Looking for good eye appeal on front (nice color, decent centering and no creases through his head)
I don’t mind small creases elsewhere and I’m not as much concerned about paper loss on back.
Thank you!
-Adam
